interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray, 4.3 oz. - Hemp Seed Oil, Aloe Vera, Frankincense Helps Stimulate Moisturize & Revitalize Damaged Hair, No Parabens, Color Safe, Lauryl & Laureth Sulfate Free
Review Date: 2020/09/14
Store: GIOVANNI
Product Description: ['GIOVANNI Hemp Hydrating Hair Shine Spray creates gloss that rocks, with a smooth surface that talks. This Mist will seal in any hairstyle, bridging the gap between natural and salon quality. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care* lines in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.*According to SPINs.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control, Shine', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Frankincense', 'Liquid Volume': '5.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 4.75 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '18640', 'UPC': '716237186409', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/GIOR7', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: I like this hair conditioner. It smells ok. After first use, my hair was very soft and smooth. It is so easy to rinse off too.
Review Title: Parabens and Sulfate Free hair conditioner
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Maintains a keen interest in hair styling tools and hair care products that promote shine and manageability, emphasizing multi-functional capabilities.
- **Performance Concern:** Values effectiveness and natural ingredients in hair care, particularly favoring products that are paraben and sulfate-free. Frustration persists with products that fall short in delivering on promised benefits, especially regarding ease of use and performance across different hair types.
- **Usage Experience:** Appreciates user-friendly products that enhance hair health, indicating a preference for versatility that suits various hair types and conditions. Recently expressed satisfaction with a product that delivered softness and smoothness while being easy to use.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Exhibits a critical yet positive outlook toward her purchases, indicating a discerning approach and a desire for high-quality results that deliver on their claims. Recently rated a product favorably, suggesting that effective performance can lead to higher satisfaction.
- **Rating Trend:** Evaluates products with a balanced perspective, weighing both positive aspects and drawbacks. The recent purchase indicates a continued trend towards seeking high-performance formulations that cater to a variety of hair care needs.

This updated summary reflects the user's ongoing quest for reliable, effective hair care solutions that prioritize health and performance while addressing diverse hair types.
